com.travelportal.dao

Interface IBookingDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookingDao

    public interface IBookingDao
    DAO interface to manage all the DB related operations during flight booking process
    Author:
    naveen.kumar

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
